answers.answer: Hi,How are you? What other symptoms are present? If there was no history of injury or trauma, foot weakness may be attributed to a variety of factors such disorders of the nervous system, diabetes, autoimmune conditions,  rheumatic diseases,  as well as medical conditions like diabetes and poliomyelitis.  If this persists or other symptoms arise, it is best that you have this checked by your doctor for proper evaluation.  Additional diagnostic tests may also be indicated. Take care and do keep us posted.
